trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_SEQ_00<tab>M'naago would like nothing more than to continue on to Castrum Oriens.
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_TODO_00<tab>Follow M'naago.
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Raubahn.
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_ALISAIE_000_001<tab>I'm pleased to report that the Empire is short three soldiers─not that any self-respecting legatus would be sorry to lose them.
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_MNAAGO_000_010<tab>Right. I believe we've rested long enough. We should resume our journey before someone notices their missing patrol.
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_ALISAIE_000_020<tab>More soldiers? I didn't think they'd come this far west, but better to be safe than sorry...
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_MNAAGO_000_030<tab>...We're clear. Only Alliance patrols ahead.
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_MNAAGO_000_031<tab>You said the forces at Castrum Oriens were under the command of Flame General Raubahn Aldynn, did you not?
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_MNAAGO_000_032<tab>By Rhalgr! The Bull of Ala Mhigo himself! I never dreamed I'd have a chance to meet the legend...

TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_PIPIN_100_030<tab>I returned from a survey of the Wall but a moment ago. We have yet to recover Papalymo's personal effects, I am sorry to say, but you may rest assured that we will notify you and yours the moment we do.

TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_PIPIN_000_033<tab>Our scouts recently informed me of an interesting development at Castellum Velodyna. Namely, the arrival of a shipment rumored to have come from the research and development facilities near the capital, containing prototype magitek armor.
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_PIPIN_000_035<tab>It is our assessment that this armor is to be field-tested here, most likely against Alliance forces. Mayhap before the day is out.
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_MNAAGO_000_036<tab>Damn it all, more magitek weapons? That's the last thing we need!

TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_PIPIN_000_037<tab>Your concern is not unwarranted, but we needn't despair just yet. The shipment is thought to have contained a single heavy unit and one or two support units. With a well-laid ambush, we are confident we can destroy them all, hindering their development and delaying future deployment.
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_RAUBAHN_000_038<tab>And should we carry this out as a joint endeavor with the Resistance, they will have their rallying cry.

TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_MNAAGO_000_039<tab>It would mean dropping all pretense about the Alliance not wanting to go to war with the Empire...but you'd have a lot more folk willing to stand up and fight if they knew they weren't alone. And you were going to have to do it eventually anyway.

TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_PIPIN_000_040<tab>Exactly. And so what I propose is simple: we harry their patrols to bait them into bringing their prototype weapons to East End, where our Resistance allies will take them from behind.
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_RAUBAHN_000_041<tab>Simple indeed, and well within our capabilities. I see no reason to delay, especially if a field test is imminent. What say you?
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_MNAAGO_000_042<tab>Assuming the vice marshal's intelligence is accurate, I agree with his assessment and fully support his plan. I shall notify my comrades at once.
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_PIPIN_000_043<tab>Understood. I shall have one of my men bring you the details of the plan anon.
TEXT_STMBDA112_02452_ALISAIE_000_044<tab>And we for our part will be fighting with the Alliance, yes? I somehow doubt you were intending to sit this one out.
